attributes.additional_details:
18/09/14
Scottish independence referendum has taken place with a final "NO" vote. As a lot of videos have surfaced that allegedly expose foul play I think there should be a recount of all votes. This could make or break! Please sign.
Thank you.

government_response.details:
As this e-petition has received more than 10 000 signatures, the relevant Government department have provided the following response:

Mary Pitcaithly, Chief Counting Officer for the Scottish Independence Referendum, has made a statement confirming that she is satisfied with the conduct of the referendum count process. This statement can be found at http://www.electionsscotland.info/


This e-petition remains open to signatures and will be considered for debate by the Backbench Business Committee should it pass the 100 000 signature threshold.
